name: HMCharacteristicEvent
desc: An event that is evaluated based on the value of a characteristic.

items.name: init(characteristic: HMCharacteristic, triggerValue: TriggerValueType?)
items.desc: Creates a new characteristic event which triggers when the specified characteristic reaches the specified value.

items.name: var characteristic: HMCharacteristic
items.desc: The characteristic associated with the event.

items.name: var triggerValue: TriggerValueType?
items.desc: The value of the characteristic that triggers the event.

declaration: class HMCharacteristicEvent<TriggerValueType> : HMEvent where TriggerValueType : NSCopying
